languages.text: "Долгой службой губернатор Драйвстем заслужил доверие госпожи Теодоры и не просто так занимает свой пост". {n}Махарий говорит жестко и властно.{/n} "От лица рода Зауэрбэк я поддерживаю его обвинения".

traits.locale_text: "Долгой службой губернатор Драйвстем заслужил доверие госпожи Теодоры и не просто так занимает свой пост". {n}Махарий говорит жестко и властно, чем сразу привлекает к себе внимание.{/n} "От лица рода Зауэрбек я поддерживаю его обвинения".
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "Over his many years of service, Governor Drivestem earned Theodora's trust, and he holds his high office for a reason." {n}Sauerback's tone is stern and imperious.{/n} "On behalf of House Sauerback, I support his accusations."
languages.original_text: "Долгой службой губернатор Драйвстем заслужил доверие госпожи Теодоры и не просто так занимает свой пост". {n}Махарий говорит жестко и властно.{/n} "От лица рода Зауэрбэк я поддерживаю его обвинения".

traits.locale_text: "During his many years of service, Governor Drivestem has won Theodora's trust and he occupies his post for a reason." {n}Macharius's voice is hard and imperative.{/n} "On behalf of House Sauerback, I support his accusations."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: "During his many years of service, Governor Drivestem has won Theodora's trust and he occupies his post for a reason." {n}Macharius's voice is hard and imperative.{/n} "On behalf of House Sauerback, I support his accusations."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: "During his many years of service, Governor Drivestem has won Theodora's trust and he holds his high office for a reason." {n}Macharius' tone is stern and imperative.{/n} "On behalf of House Sauerback, I support his accusations."

traits.locale_text: "Over his many years of service, Governor Drivestem earned Theodora's trust, and he holds his high office for a reason." {n}Sauerback's tone is stern and imperious.{/n} "On behalf of House Sauerback, I support his accusations."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: "Over his many years of service, Governor Drivestem earned Theodora's trust, and he holds his high office for a reason." {n}Sauerback's tone is stern and imperious.{/n} "On behalf of House Sauerback, I support his accusations."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: 「長年の奉公を通じてそれなりの理由があるから、ドライブステン総督はシオドーラの信頼を勝ち取って要職に就いているのだ」{n}ザウアーバックの口調は、厳しく威圧的だ。{/n}「ザウアーバック家を代表し、ドライブステンの訴えを支持する」
languages.original_text: "Over his many years of service, Governor Drivestem earned Theodora's trust, and he holds his high office for a reason." {n}Sauerback's tone is stern and imperious.{/n} "On behalf of House Sauerback, I support his accusations."

traits.locale_text: 「長年の奉公を通じてそれなりの理由があるから、ドライブステン総督はシオドーラの信頼を勝ち取って要職に就いているのだ」{n}ザウアーバックの口調は、厳しく威圧的だ。{/n}「ザウアーバック家を代表し、ドライブステンの訴えを支持する」
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: “德莱夫斯塔总督多年来忠心耿耿、恪尽职守，因此西奥多拉才会对他委以重任。”{n}苏尔贝克义正辞严。{/n}“我代表苏尔贝克家族，支持他的指控。”
languages.original_text: "Over his many years of service, Governor Drivestem earned Theodora's trust, and he holds his high office for a reason." {n}Sauerback's tone is stern and imperious.{/n} "On behalf of House Sauerback, I support his accusations."

traits.locale_text: “德莱夫斯塔总督多年来忠心耿耿、恪尽职守，因此西奥多拉才会对他委以重任。”{n}马卡里乌斯义正辞严道。{/n}“我代表苏尔贝克家族，支持他的指控。”
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: « Pendant toutes ses années de service, le gouverneur Drivestem a gagné la confiance de Théodora. S'il occupe cette haute fonction, ce n'est pas sans raison, » {n}dit Sauerback sur un ton sévère.{/n} « Au nom de la maison Sauerback, j'appuie ses accusations. »
languages.original_text: "Over his many years of service, Governor Drivestem earned Theodora's trust, and he holds his high office for a reason." {n}Sauerback's tone is stern and imperious.{/n} "On behalf of House Sauerback, I support his accusations."

traits.locale_text: « Pendant toutes ses années de service, le gouverneur Drivestem a gagné la confiance de Théodora. S'il occupe cette haute fonction, ce n'est pas sans raison, {n}dit Macharius sur un ton austère.{/n} Au nom de la maison Sauerback, j'appuie ses accusations. »
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: «El gobernador Drivestem se ganó la confianza de Theodora durante sus muchos años de servicio y ocupa su alto cargo por algo». {n}El tono de Sauerback es serio e imperativo.{/n} «Respaldo sus acusaciones en nombre de la casa Sauerback».
languages.original_text: "Over his many years of service, Governor Drivestem earned Theodora's trust, and he holds his high office for a reason." {n}Sauerback's tone is stern and imperious.{/n} "On behalf of House Sauerback, I support his accusations."

traits.locale_text: «El gobernador Drivestem se ha ganado la confianza de Theodora durante sus muchos años de servicio y ocupa su alto cargo por algo». {n}El tono de Macharius es serio e imperativo.{/n} «Respaldo sus acusaciones en nombre de la casa Sauerback».
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "In seinen vielen Jahren des Dienstes hat Gouverneur Drivestem Theodoras Vertrauen gewonnen, er hat dieses hohe Amt nicht ohne Grund inne." {n}Sauerbacks Ton ist streng und gebieterisch.{/n} "Ich unterstütze seine Anschuldigungen im Name des Hauses Sauerback."
languages.original_text: "Over his many years of service, Governor Drivestem earned Theodora's trust, and he holds his high office for a reason." {n}Sauerback's tone is stern and imperious.{/n} "On behalf of House Sauerback, I support his accusations."

traits.locale_text: "In seinen vielen Jahren des Dienstes hat Gouverneur Drivestem Theodoras Vertrauen gewonnen, er hat dieses hohe Amt nicht ohne Grund inne." {n}Macharius' Ton ist streng und gebieterisch.{/n} "Ich unterstütze seine Anschuldigungen im Name des Hauses Sauerback."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "Vali Drivestem, uzun yıllar icra ettiği vazifesi boyunca Theodora'nın güvenini kazanmış ve yüksek makamını hak etmiştir." {n}Sauerback'in tonlaması, katı ve buyurgan.{/n} "Sauerback Hanesi adına bu ithamları destekliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Over his many years of service, Governor Drivestem earned Theodora's trust, and he holds his high office for a reason." {n}Sauerback's tone is stern and imperious.{/n} "On behalf of House Sauerback, I support his accusations."

traits.locale_text: "Vali Drivestem, uzun yıllar icra ettiği vazifesi boyunca Theodora'nın güvenini kazanmış ve yüksek makamını hak etmiştir." {n}Sauerback'in tonlaması katı ve buyurgan.{/n} "Sauerback Hanesi adına bu ithamları destekliyorum."
traits.speaker: Zaurback
